content.p: Decide which type of study design was used for each of the following scenarios:

body.p: In order to discover which of 4 weight loss programs gets the best results, subjects are randomly selected to each of the programs.

response.feedback: Correct. We assigned each subject to a weight loss program.
Incorrect. The subjects were not able to choose which program they wanted to use.

body.p: In order to find out which graduates have the highest starting salaries, we gather information from graduates of ivy league, private, and public universities.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Would we be able to assign each student to a university?
Correct. We would not be able to assign each student to a university.

body.p: A delivery company that owns a fleet of trucks performs a study to determine whether rotating tires at specific intervals has any effect on the number of miles a set of tires lasts.

response.feedback: Correct. The company would be able to decide which trucks will have their tires rotated and which ones will not.
Incorrect. The company would be able to decide which trucks will have their tires rotated and which ones will not.
